detail_desc: LOVE STORIES x H&M. Bikini bottoms with an elasticated mid waist, rings at the sides and medium coverage at the back. Lined.
Thong briefs in organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a soft pile inside, collar and diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs.
Skinny-fit leggings in printed cotton jersey. Easy pull-on waist with visible elastication.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Long, fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey, two with flounces across the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Three-strand metal necklace with three different pendants. Adjustable length 38-44.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low  dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed viscose jersey with a deep neckline, decorative button band with sparkly stone buttons down the front and long sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Trousers in soft, rib-knit merino wool. High waist with covered elastication and gently flared legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a hood and dropped shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with wide elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with creases.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and diagonal side pockets.

Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow tie at the top and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Sewn-on waistcoat in woven fabric with a decorative chest pocket, sewn-in handkerchief and buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Knee-length skirt in jersey crêpe with a high waist with concealed elastication, a wrapover front with a draped knot detail at one side and an asymmetric hem.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Shirt in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with a large collar and buttons down the front. Flared cuffs with a button and slit, and a yoke with pleats and a peplum seam at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Coat in a felted wool blend with a shawl collar, detachable tie belt at the waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and no buttons. Unlined.
Vest top in rib-knit cotton with buttons down the front.
Waist belt with decorative metal buckles at the front and elastication with a metal fastener. at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a turtle neck and long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and decorative buttons.
Earmuffs in faux fur with a plastic headband covered in imitation leather. Polyester filling.
Top in cotton jersey with a lace top layer at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Vest tops in stretch organic cotton jersey.
Suit shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and legs with creases.
Hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Chino shorts in a patterned cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Checked Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets.
Dress in lightweight, patterned twill with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Anklets in different designs of metal chain. Adjustable length.

Blouse in an airy weave with a burnout pattern. Small, frilled stand-up collar, a smocked yoke and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.
Hair clip in metal with a large fabric bow. Size of bow approx. 15x16 cm.
5-pocket trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Short, straight-cut, sleeveless dress in cotton corduroy with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with flap front pockets. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front pockets and flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and soft brushed inside. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons at the front.

Cropped top in seersucker made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a frill at the top, a sweetheart neckline and buttons down the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim.

Backpack in nylon with a roll-top opening with a zip and an adjustable tab with a plastic fastener. A handle at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps, compartments at the sides, one in mesh, and a zipped inner compartment in mesh. Padded laptop compartment with hook and loop fastening and a padded base plate. Lined. Size 17x27x44 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Long-sleeved body in stretch lace with a round neckline and narrow, vertical elastication down the front, back and sides, as well as on the sleeves for a draped effect. Press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back.
Playsuit in patterned jersey with a wrapover top and short sleeves. Deep V-neck at the back with ties at the top, a seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

All-in-one suit in soft pile. Hood with ears and a zip down the front that has a chin guard at the top and continues down one leg. Opening mitts at the cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey.

Fully-fashioned, glittery hi-top trainers with a ribbed trim at the ankles and a grosgrain loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy, patterned rubber soles.
Fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen. V-neck and loose-knit sections front and back.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dress in an airy, textured weave with short, gathered puff sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, smocking at the waist and lined skirt.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a slit at the front.
Top in satin with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined at the bust.
Ballet pumps with a grosgrain trim around the top and elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. (Sizes 0-1 have soft soles.)
A-line blouse in an airy, patterned weave with buttons at the top of the back. Gathered yoke with a lace trim at the front and short, lace-trimmed butterfly sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, boxy-style jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly with a press-stud, and tapered legs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Ankle-length dress in crinkled chiffon with discreet, toning embroidery. Small frilled collar, a gathered bodice and a smocked, flounce-trimmed seam at the waist. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Small opening with a button at the back. Softly draping skirt with a frill-trimmed seam and flounce to the hem. Jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
